com.god.kahit.viewModel

Class QuestionViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewModel
      • com.god.kahit.viewModel.QuestionViewModel

  • public class QuestionViewModel
extends ViewModel
    The viewModel for the QuestionView, the class handles the fetching of data for the view.

    used by: QuestionView, QuestionViewModel_LifecycleAdapter
